definition: it's not important/it's nothing/never mind/to have nothing to do/to be free/to be all right (out of danger or trouble)
to have spare time/free from work/it's not important/it's nothing/never mind

sentences.english: Yes, It's ok, go talk to he.
I was a little tired yesterday, but I'm OK now.
sentences.chinese: 昨天還有點累，現在沒事兒了。

sentences.english: There was no work in the office this afternoon so everyone idled about.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午辦公室裏沒事幹，所以大家都無所事事。

sentences.english: "He told me:"drink spot hot boiling water , so watermelon seeds were died.
sentences.chinese: 多喝一點熱開水，把西瓜籽燙死就沒事了。

sentences.english: We had just gotten to America and everybody else had gotten off.
sentences.chinese: 我們剛剛到達美國，別的人都沒事兒。

sentences.english: Every now and then Justin and Audrey also love to doodle on the glass doors with markers.
sentences.chinese: 平時有事沒事大小貝貝還拿彩色筆在玻璃上塗鴉。

sentences.english: But no matter. I doubt we shall ever speak again.
sentences.chinese: 不過沒事，恐怕我們以後都不會說話了。

sentences.english: It's ok. He will come back soon.
sentences.chinese: 沒事的，別難過，他很快就會回來的。

sentences.english: 'Don't worry,' I say to my wife.
I never feel bored or at loose ends . " 8 o;"
sentences.chinese: 我從來也沒有感到沒事幹或無聊的。

sentences.english: But I've become slower with my sword lately.
sentences.chinese: 本來我應該沒事，但是我的刀沒以前快。

sentences.english: "On, you all right?" Little green rushed forward to hold on.
sentences.chinese: “月月，你沒事吧？”小青趕緊跑上前去扶住月月。

sentences.english: Do you need any help? - No. I'm fine.

definition: to have spare time/free from work/it's not important/it's nothing/never mind
to play a joke/to make fun of/to joke
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
a moment/a while/in a moment/also pr. [yi1 hui3]
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
